name: 3dTcorrMap
author: AFNI Developers
description: AFNI program to compute correlation maps of input time series data

inputs.description: Read 3D+time dataset 'dd'. This provides the time series to be correlated en masse. This is a mandatory option.
inputs.name: Input dataset

inputs.description: Read 3D+time dataset 'bb'. It correlates the -seed voxel time series with every voxel in the -input dataset.
inputs.name: Seed dataset

inputs.description: Read dataset 'mmm' as a voxel mask.
inputs.name: Mask dataset

inputs.description: Create a mask from the input dataset.
inputs.name: Automask

inputs.description: Save average correlations into dataset prefix 'pp'.
inputs.name: Mean correlations output prefix

inputs.description: Save tanh of mean arctanh(correlation) into 'pp'.
inputs.name: Tanh of mean arctanh output prefix

inputs.description: Save average of squared positive correlations into 'pp'.
inputs.name: Positive squared correlation output prefix

inputs.description: Save the COUNT of how many voxels survived thresholding at level abs(correlation) >= tt.
inputs.name: Thresholding level

inputs.description: Save the COUNT of how many voxels survive thresholding at multiple levels abs(correlation) >= tt.
inputs.name: Variable thresholding levels

inputs.description: Like '-VarThresh', but the output counts are 'Normalized'.
inputs.name: Normalized variable thresholding levels

inputs.description: Output at each voxel the entire correlation map, into a dataset with prefix 'pp'.
inputs.name: Correlation map output prefix

inputs.description: By default, -CorrMap outputs a sub-brick for EACH input dataset voxel. Eliminates these sub-bricks using this option.
inputs.name: Correlation mask

inputs.description: For each correlation 'r', compute the calc-style expression 'expr', and average these values to get the output that goes into dataset 'ppp'.
inputs.name: Average expression

inputs.description: As in '-Aexpr', but only average together nonzero values computed by 'expr'.
inputs.name: Conditional average expression

inputs.description: As above, but the sum of the expressions is computed rather than the average.
inputs.name: Sum expression

inputs.description: For each voxel, save a histogram of the correlation coefficients into dataset ppp.
inputs.name: Correlation coefficient histogram
